alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 3:05AM MST until January 12 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, West Central Highlands, and Lower Rio Grande Valley. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 2 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; West Central Highlands
